"JE Bennett Law is a private client law firm which specialises in providing legal services to the vulnerable client. The vulnerable client can be someone of any age, injured at birth, or through disease/illness; as a result of clinical negligence or personal injury, or simply as a result of the ageing process. We pride ourselves on our holistic approach to our clientsâ€™ needs."

- Jane Bennett, Managing Director and Senior Partner

Our three areas of legal specialism:

Vulnerable client law

Our core specialism consists in the provision of truly independent professional deputyship services under the Court of Protection, and advice to lay deputies, together with professional trustee services (both within and outside of the Court of Protection).

Read more

Expert witness

Our standing in the field, means we also reguIarly provide expert witness services in relation to deputyship and personal injury trust vehicles arising from personal injury, clinical negligence or Criminal Injury Compensation Authority claims.

Read more
